com.mirabox.streamdock.twitch_live_strea.Name: Chat messages
com.mirabox.streamdock.twitch_live_strea.Tooltip: Send an editable chat message without the "/" command line.

com.mirabox.streamdock.twitch_live_strea.Name: clear chat
com.mirabox.streamdock.twitch_live_strea.Tooltip: Clear the chat interface and make it invisible to users.  (Management is not affected)

com.mirabox.streamdock.twitch_live_strea.Name: Follower Chat
com.mirabox.streamdock.twitch_live_strea.Tooltip: Turn on restricting chat to followers.

com.mirabox.streamdock.twitch_live_strea.Name: Play Ad
com.mirabox.streamdock.twitch_live_strea.Tooltip: Play an ad during the live stream.

com.mirabox.streamdock.twitch_live_strea.Name: Chat slowly
com.mirabox.streamdock.twitch_live_strea.Tooltip: Enable limiting the frequency of chat messages.

com.mirabox.streamdock.twitch_live_strea.Name: Shield defense mode
com.mirabox.streamdock.twitch_live_strea.Tooltip: Emergency blocking of all information in the live broadcast room.

com.mirabox.streamdock.twitch_live_strea.Name: audience
com.mirabox.streamdock.twitch_live_strea.Tooltip: Displays the real-time number of people in the live broadcast room.

com.mirabox.streamdock.twitch_live_strea.Name: Live play/game titles
com.mirabox.streamdock.twitch_live_strea.Tooltip: The title of the live broadcast room and the type of game.

com.mirabox.streamdock.twitch_live_strea.Name: Create clip
com.mirabox.streamdock.twitch_live_strea.Tooltip: Creates a clip of a specified duration.

com.mirabox.streamdock.twitch_live_strea.Name: previous clip
com.mirabox.streamdock.twitch_live_strea.Tooltip: Open the latest clip in the clip content.

Localization.留空'频道'参数时，将对你自己的频道执行操作。: Empty 'Channel' performs action on your own channel.
Localization.请您打开直播间后再试！: Please open the live stream and try again!
Localization.请求至少更新一个属性！: Request must update at least one attribute!
Localization.请求过于频繁，请稍后再试！: Requests too frequent, try again later!
Localization.不支持包含'/'的聊天指令，列如'/announce': Chat commands with '/' are not supported, e.g. '/announce'
